name: TTMMKKMM (Prototype)
description:
Controls WASD Movement SpaceJump Notes

!!! Game is optimized for FHD (1920x1080) so it is recommended to play in that resolution !!!

TTMMKKMM (short for "Tech Tech Mech Mech Kitty Kitty Meow Meow ") is a prototype made in 8 days for "Level up circle game jam #1" - Theme was "temperature is the key".

It is rhythm/bullet hell side-scroller about robot cat named "tuxy". Tuxy has to recharge its battery by collecting "pawer" notes of matching temperature without overheating it.

Each time battery overheats, half of its energy gets discharged.

Goal of the game is to charge battery to 100% and clear the level.

Credits

 Big thanks to Jasmin Bovin for sharing the songwriting workload with me and giving me much needed time to polish features. 

His tracks:

- Main menu theme

- Quad of tech theme

Check out his other tracks at: https://soundcloud.com/jasminboivin
